thread.title: Mariah Carey Works Out in Fishnets Heels - Mariah Carey At The Gym in Fenty by Rihanna Heels
thread.title_full: Mariah Carey Works Out in Fishnets and Heels - Mariah Carey At The Gym in Fenty by Rihanna Heels

author: Lauren Alexis Fisher
title: Mariah Carey Works Out in Fishnets Heels - Mariah Carey At The Gym in Fenty by Rihanna Heels
text:
Mariah Carey has spent her entire career convincing the world she's just like us. So it's no surprise that she rolled up to the gym yesterday wearing the same exact workout gear as you ( so awkward!): fishnets, a bodysuit, bomber jacket, diamond necklaces and Fenty x Puma heels ( which really excited Rihanna ). The Elusive Chanteuse and new fitness icon hit the gym for a workout with celebrity trainer, Gunnar Peterson, and the end result was nothing short of inspiring.
 First, she turned the gym into an actual runway (as one does) by running prancercising down the aisles in-between machines:
Running amok. @gunnarfitness
A video posted by Mariah Carey (@mariahcarey) on Feb 2, 2017 at 7:18pm PST
